name: John Chapman
introduction: John Chapman's love affair with film started when he was cast as X-Wing Pilot "Red 12 Drifter" in the original Star Wars Movie - A New Hope.After a twenty year career in business and project management, John moved into film and music video production, where he executive produced She'll Fall For Me, a music video for Christopher Lee.With his business knowledge and film contacts throughout the UK and US, John is a director of Ghost Pictures and The Performance Academy. He is the producer of Walking with Shadows, a chilling teen drama. John is also set to direct his own screenplay Lost In Security, and a Newbury Community Youth Project, The Chain. John has a number of other projects in various stages of development.
